name: ss-ticket
effect: Allows passage on a ferry. The same item is used for different ferries between different games.
short_effect: Ticket for a ship. (RSE: S.S. Tidal LF: S.S. Anne HG: S.S. Aqua)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry.
flavor_text.emerald: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. ANNE. It has a drawing of a ship on it.
